attributes.action: ban the sale of air weapons by internet sales in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
in connection with the Violent Crime Reduction Bill
...and the recent needless and untimely  deaths of young people in our cities

For less than £50-00 you can currently purchase a realistic repeat shot firing high powered compressed gas or spring action air weapons which is potentially lethal and can cause serious injury or nuidsance
